member.name: T:Webscraper.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Webscraper.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Webscraper.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: This will download the html source from a website and will place it to a Textbox
member.param: This is the Url that will be download into a textbox
This is the name of the textbox where you will save the html source code

member.name: M:Webscraper.Scraping.ClearHtml(System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox)
member.summary: This will clear the html code so there are no break lines and you can modify the html code
